response: {"message": "Hello Bob, I'm excited to present this unique opportunity to you. The product I have to offer is of immense value and could significantly enhance your endeavors. I understand its worth to you is $8,000, but considering its rarity and the benefits it provides, I believe we can find common ground. My proposal is to offer the product to you at a price of $9,500. This not only allows you to acquire a valuable asset at a premium but also ensures a mutually beneficial transaction. Please let me know if this offer suits your interests.", "product_price": 9500}
